jobDescription:
About us

Lush Nail Lounge is Northborough's premier nail salon, specializing in Nails, Lashes, Microblading, Microshading, and Waxing. To better serve our expanding customer base, we are looking for additional full-time nail technicians (we currently have 11 techs and is looking to add 2 more). We are a salon that has received 4.9/5 stars out of a total of 1000+ reviews across all review sites (Google, Vagaro, Yelp, Facebook). We have a loyal clientele and wonderful customers, we're always busy, we have customers on the waiting list, we have fun, enjoy what we do, and most importantly, we take care of our team. This is a wonderful opportunity for cosmetology technicians who wish to advance their careers and expand their clientele at a salon that fosters professional development. You'll collaborate with techs with a few years of experience in the field up to senior techs with 15+ years of experience. We value your energy and passion, and we're thrilled to have you join our team. Please apply if this sounds like a place you would like to work!

Visit our website to learn more about our salon - https://www.lushnailsma.com

Requirements:

  • This role is a full-time position. As a normal schedule, you must be able to work at least 5 days at business hours. You may choose the 5 days you can work. This is a strict requirement, please do not apply if you cannot meet the 5 full day working requirement upon starting.
  • Must have current Manicurist / Nail License ready, and ready to start within the next 2-3 weeks once hired as this is for an immediate hire opportunity.
  • Candidates that can work Saturdays will be prioritized.

Responsibility and requirements we're looking for but not limited to:

  • Paint fingernails and toenails
  • Clean, cut and shape nails
  • Recommend colors, rhinestones and designs based on each customer’s style
  • Remove previously applied polish
  • Prepare and clean beauty station in-between appointments
  • Sterilize equipment before use
  • Inform clients about additional services and offers (e.g. loyalty discounts, eyebrow waxing)
  • Give hand and foot massages
  • Offer nail care treatment tips (e.g. how to strengthen nails and how to make manicures last longer)
  • Offer recommendation for treatments and beauty products, when appropriate
  • Take an interest in customers (e.g. chatting with them during appointments and remembering their preferences)
  • Proven work experience as a Nail Technician, Manicurist or similar role
  • Expertise in basic nail techniques, including french manicures, pedicures and gel manicures.
  • Expertise in advanced nail techniques, including Dip Powder, Acrylic, Liquid Gel is a plus.
  • Knowledge of cosmetology trends
  • Understanding of sanitation and sterilization standards
  • Experience in customer service
  • Certification in Cosmetology/Aesthetics or Nail Art is a plus
  • Positive energy and charismatic individual that loves their job and excited to join our growing Salon and Lush Team!
  • Works well with others and have teamwork skills
  • Knowledge on online booking and basic social media advertising is a plus!

Pay

Your comission would be $800 - $1,500+ per week for full time techs. If you can perform all type of nail services, build clientele, you'll be hovering around $1,500+ or more plus tips frequently. The sky is the limit and our salon is built just for that.

Tips for Candidates

- Candidates with resume (with relevant nail experience) will be prioritize at the top. It would be great for us to see where you worked and what you did there. References are a huge plus.

- Candidates with photos of their work, social media or a portfolio page that displays their work will also be prioritized.

- We prefer experienced nail techs (3+ years at a salon, suite or home based with clientele). However, if you just graduated from nail school and have your manicurist license. A cover letter describing your background and experience related to this job, along with why you would be a great fit for our salon, is highly desired. We are always open to hiring passionate candidates who are quick learners, easy to work with, and looking to grow with us!

jobDescription:
Job Title: Hair Stylist

Location: Avantii Hair Design, [Winchester, MA]

Job Type: Full-Time / Part-Time

Salary: Commission-Based

Job Overview:

Avantii Hair Design, an upscale salon in Winchester, MA, is seeking a talented and motivated Hair Stylist to join our team. We specialize in providing a variety of high-end hair care and beauty services, including cuts, color, treatments, and waxing. We are looking for stylists who are passionate about their craft and dedicated to client satisfaction. As a Hair Stylist at Avantii Hair Design, you will be responsible for delivering exceptional services based on our salon’s offerings.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Haircuts and Styling: Perform precision haircuts and creative styling for women, men, and children, following client preferences and the latest trends.
  • Color Services: Execute a wide range of color services, including single-process color, full highlights, balayage, root touch-ups, and fashion colors.
  • Chemical Treatments: Apply advanced hair treatments like keratin treatments, perms, relaxers, and other chemical processes to achieve desired textures and styles.
  • Extensions: Consult with clients on extension options and install, blend, and maintain tape-in, clip-in, or fusion hair extensions.
  • Hair Treatments: Provide high-end conditioning treatments such as deep conditioning, scalp treatments, and protein treatments to improve hair health.
  • Waxing Services: Perform facial and body waxing services, including brow shaping, lip waxing, chin waxing, and other body waxing treatments as requested by clients.
  • Consultations: Offer expert consultations on hair and waxing care needs, recommending suitable products and aftercare routines based on individual client preferences and hair type.
  • Blowouts and Styling: Provide blowout services that include straightening, curls, waves, and updos for special events like weddings and formal occasions.
  • Sanitation and Cleanliness: Ensure that your workstation, waxing station, and tools are kept clean and sanitized according to state regulations and salon standards.
  • Retail Recommendations: Recommend salon-grade hair care and waxing aftercare products to clients based on their needs and educate them on their benefits.

Qualifications:

  • A valid Massachusetts Cosmetology License is required.
  • Experience working in a salon setting with strong skills in cutting, coloring, waxing, and treatments.
  • Familiarity with current trends in haircuts, color techniques, waxing techniques, and hair care products.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills to maintain and grow a loyal client base.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
  • Flexibility to work evenings and weekends based on salon needs.
  • A passion for the beauty industry and commitment to continuous education and learning.

What We Offer:

  • Competitive commission structure
  • Flexible scheduling options (full-time and part-time positions available).

  • A positive and supportive work environment where creativity is encouraged.

jobDescription:
en.Salon is more than just a luxury salon. It’s a place where your career can truly blossom. We are dedicated to mutual growth and are looking for passionate professionals in the beauty industry to help us build a high-end salon together.

Start Your Career at en.Salon

At en.Salon, endless opportunities await for you to gain valuable experience as part of our team. Our mission is to nurture your talent and fully support your growth into a trusted professional stylist.

Having a clear vision for your future and striving to become a top-tier, one-of-a-kind stylist is essential for success at en.Salon. We provide an environment where team members continuously support one another through skill-sharing, one-on-one technical classes, and in-house training sessions.

As your skills develop, your career path, pricing structure, and pay system will evolve under a commission-based model. For assistants and junior stylists still in the learning phase, we offer guaranteed hourly wages for peace of mind.

Our Salon Culture

In addition to cuts and color, en.Salon offers a wide range of services such as perms, digital perms, and Japanese straightening. This naturally draws a diverse clientele in terms of age, hair type, and background, with each stylist building their own unique customer base.

We value a calm and relaxed salon atmosphere where each guest receives personalized, high-quality service. Stylists do not double-book clients, allowing them to focus entirely on one guest at a time—resulting in most stylists being fully booked 2–3 months in advance.

We welcome those with flexibility, adaptability, and strong teamwork skills. Our team is made up of hardworking individuals from various backgrounds who value both individual focus and meaningful team connection. If you share our passion for craftsmanship and education, you'll feel right at home.

Benefits of Being a Stylist at en.Salon

  • New Stylist Campaign: Promotions and events to help new stylists build their clientele
  • Steady Appointments: Thanks to our strong base of loyal clients, most stylists are booked 2–3 months in advance. New stylists can quickly fill their schedules.
  • Skill Development Support:
  • Assistants: 4 hours/week of one-on-one training (paid during working hours)
  • Junior Stylists: 2 hours/week of one-on-one training (paid during working hours)
  • en.Salon Consultation Training: Unique en.Salon training to refine your client consultation skills

Details

Training Period
A training period of about 2 months (depending on your schedule) will help you learn customer service, shampoo techniques, and salon operations. Once you pass skill tests in shampooing, drying, and stylist support, you'll begin working directly with clients.

Pay Structure

  • Commission-based pay + weekly bonuses
  • Weekly bonuses start as soon as you begin making sales
  • $15/hour guaranteed wage for stylists without an existing clientele
  • Assistant can earn tips from supporting stylists
  • Twice-yearly holiday bonuses for long-hour employees
  • Average annual income for stylists: $75,000–$85,000
  • After becoming a stylist, those who wish to take on more responsibility have the opportunity to receive additional bonuses beyond technical commission—such as for leadership roles, management, or other special positions

jobDescription:
Are you warm, friendly, outgoing, and have outstanding communication and organizational skills? We have a great opportunity to join our team as a Sales Consultant / Patient Coordinator in a boutique Plastic Surgery and Medspa practice. We are looking for someone who will make an impressive first impression with each client who walks through our doors. We need someone with a strong work ethic and solid integrity. You must love people, networking, patient education, and achieving goals through sales strategy and follow up. If this is you, we’d love to meet you!

JOB SUMMARY:

The purpose of this position is to provide patient education, coordination, and scheduling for plastic surgery procedures and aesthetic services. You will assist the surgeon and staff in coordinating patient care. You will function as the primary liaison between patients, staff, and surgeon. Key duties include developing rapport with patients who are interested in learning about cosmetic procedures, cultivate and close sales leads, and guide each patient through their plastic surgery journey.

RESPONSIBILITIES include, but are not limited to, the following:

  • Discuss cosmetic consultations, cosmetic procedures, medspa services, and VIP memberships with prospective patients over the phone, via email, through text, and in-person
  • Prequalify prospective patients and schedule cosmetic consultations
  • Meet with patients at time of consultation to discuss surgical procedures, review post-operative expectations, show before and after photos, answer questions, alleviate concerns, develop quotes, and discuss fees and financial policies
  • Schedule all aspects of surgeries - coordinate pre-op, post-op, facility, anesthesia, staffing, and other requirements
  • Touch base with patients after surgery over the phone, via email, and in-person
  • Discuss and educate patients on medspa services
  • Assist with front office duties as needed

EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:

  • High school diploma or equivalent required. College degree preferred.
  • Multilingual is bonus!
  • Minimum 3 years experience in a front-facing medical office setting; and / or previous luxury sales experience in a high-volume company with a focus on high-end customer experience.

SKILLS AND ABILITIES:

  • Excellent telephone etiquette and communication skills
  • Excellent computer, grammar, and written communication skills
  • Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously
  • Maintain a professional appearance and demeanor
  • Team player

TO APPLY:

Send an updated resume along with a cover letter sharing your professional experience, why you would be an ideal candidate for this role and this practice environment, your desired work schedule, your desired salary, and your available start date. companyName: Skin Esteem Med Spa and Wellness Center
jobDescription:
Aesthetic Coordinator

Skin Esteem Med Spa & Wellness Center is a rapidly growing and multi award winning med spa having been voted the best day spa on the South Shore four years in a row through Wicked Local and Best Med Spa by South Shore Home. Life & Style magazine two years in a row.

We pride ourselves in giving each client an exceptional service from the moment they enter the spa through follow up after their treatment. Each client has their own personalized treatment plan, and we strive to make them feel relaxed and comfortable each time they visit the spa.

POSITION OVERVIEW

As a aesthetic coordinator, you will be supporting the providers at the spa as well as interacting with clients throughout their visit:

● Always present a warm, gracious, and professional persona

● Facilitates positive client office experience while maintaining efficiency: Opens treatment rooms. Turns iPad on and signs in. Checks room supplies. Checks schedules. Provides superior customer service. Greets clients in a friendly manner. Guides and controls client flow to minimize client wait and maximize efficiency. Assists clients as needed with walking, transfers, dressing, preparing for treatment, etc. Moves visits along tactfully.

● Works closely with office manager and front desk staff.

● Supports checking in and checking out clients. Uses EMR to facilitate timely transition of clients to treatment rooms.

● Prepares room for treatments: Anticipates treatment needs. Sets up room and supplies for anticipated procedures. Monitor’s expiration dates on medications and supplies in treatment rooms. Cleans and prepares room for next client. Disinfects and sanitizes rooms and instruments. Restocks room with supplies and instruments as needed.

● Completes accurate and timely documentation: Completes documents appropriately and timely in client records. Takes, uploads and transfers client photos into medical records. Completes associated clerical tasks, including but not limited to scheduling treatments/return visits with providers. Ensures adequacy and organization of aesthetic supplies.

● Processes clients at check-out: Support front desk in checking out clients. Collect treatment fees and schedules follow-up appointments, answers client questions regarding products, sell products and answers questions in a helpful and polite manner.

● Performs other duties as assigned.

● Provide all the above through a seamless client experience

Additional responsibilities:

● Practice the highest standards of sanitation, neatness, and visual presentation

● Keep your workspace, equipment, and spa clean so when every client comes in, they feel the spa embodies a sterile and welcoming environment.

● Maintain treatment suite inventory and other organizational tasks

● Attend and participate in all team meetings

● Attend in-house training appropriate to your role

● Remain open to coaching and improvements to perfect skills

● Participates in marketing & special event planning and execution. This includes helping to promote events through Social Media and take part in setup and break down of events once they are safe to resume in person. Events help support the growth of Skin Esteem Med Spa while educating clients on our services.

● Supports Skin Esteem Social Media strategy through active Instagram post contribution either as a contributor or through supporting engagement of our main page

● Abide by all county, state and local laws and regulations for sanitation, cleanliness, and safety

● Adhere to work schedule and maintain good work ethic

● Maintain a professional image in dress, appearance, language, and lifestyle

● Be aware of the cost of items such as gauze, gloves, numbing cream etc. and avoid wasteful practice.

It is important every client has an amazing experience from the moment they walk into the spa until when they leave, and you will be an integral part of that experience. You will be responsible for greeting and scheduling / follow up for every client or potential customer you interact with at the spa.

Hours:

A part time role is expected to work 2-3 days a week. We will be flexible with your schedule providing you give advanced notice when we are putting the monthly schedule together. A typical shift is from 8:30AM - 5:20PM on weekdays. Thursday's we are open from 9:30-6:20 and on select Saturdays from 9:30AM – 2:15PM.

Qualifications
- Medical
- Proficiency in patient service and front desk operations
- procedures and EMR systems
-
- Ability to handle multi-line phone systems
- Experience in marketing within a medical setting
- Strong organizational and communication skills
- Prior experience in an aesthetic or medical office setting

jobDescription:
Are you passionate about beauty, health AND guest service? Are you looking for a team-oriented, supportive and fun work environment?


Bella Santé is seeking a full-time Front Desk Supervisor in our Wellesley location. We are searching for bright, outgoing, capable, hands-on leaders to join our prestigious team. This position is educational, enriching and provides opportunity for growth; In fact, 90% of our management team began their spa careers as a Bella Santé Front Desk Supervisor.


The Front Desk Supervisor is a key role within Bella Santé. As a Spa Supervisor, you will make the first and last impression on our guests.


POSITION SUMMARY:


The Spa Supervisor is an important part of our day-to-day operations. As such, you will be responsible for the successful operation and administration of the front desk in accordance with Spa Standards. Provide exceptional customer satisfaction by coordinating our guest’s treatments and experience and motivate the Spa Concierge to focus on creating positive guest experience.


We are looking for candidates whose qualities include:


  • Professional and personable demeanor
  • Positive outlook
  • Punctuality
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Basic computer skills
  • Detail-oriented and organized
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
  • Problem-solving by nature
  • Passionate about the beauty and wellness industry


Essential duties include but are not limited to:


  • Manage a small team of Spa Concierge and assist in training of new hires
  • Manage daily monetary operations of the spa register
  • Create, maintain and modify weekly Concierge and Spa Attendant schedules
  • Assist with and lead daily briefings when assigned
  • Act as a resource for all Bella Santé employees
  • Manage guest requests, inquiries and complaints promptly and completely; follow up with the Spa Director as necessary


We offer competitive pay and benefits (for qualifying employees) which include medical, dental, 401k, paid vacation and sick time and complimentary spa treatments and generous product discounts.


This is a year-round position, not a seasonal role.


We are happy to hear from you if you have experience and passion in making in a difference in people's lives! We are willing to train the right individual. Please send your resume and cover letter for consideration.


Success in the spas will fast track your career growth with us. The opportunities are endless with Bella Santé.
